Name: PrePaladin Wars
About the game: Simulated Combat Feel the realism of combat with visual simulation of every limb. The game has underlying arcade style system where you must wait for the right moment to hit, otherwise you can’t deal damage. Bird Fly Mode Relax from combat in bird mode levels with full gameplay change where you shoot arrows and avoid obstacles. Beautiful Terrain The terrain is based on real world topographies which adds realism and immersion to the game. Cinematic Soundtrack Enjoy the cinematic music composed by Nicolas Jeudy. Story Story follows Ari through waves of enemies as he wanders after losing his home village.
